DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-center, long-term safety and efficacy follow-up study for subjects with hemoglobinopathies (Î²-thalassemia or severe sickle cell disease) who have been treated with ex vivo gene therapy drug product in bluebird bio-sponsored clinical studies. After completing the parent clinical study (approximately 2 years), eligible subjects will be followed for an additional 13 years for a total of 15 years post-drug product infusion. No investigational drug product will be administered in the study.
DOC.brief_title: Longterm Follow-up of Subjects With Hemoglobinopathies Treated With Ex Vivo Gene Therapy
DOC.criteria: Provision of written informed consent for this study by subjects, or as applicable, subject's parent(s)/legal guardian(s) Treated with drug product for therapy of a hemoglobinopathy in a bluebird biosponsored clinical study Able to comply with study requirements Met the VCN discontinuation criterion in the parent study
